text: Sofyan Amrabat (; born 21 August 1996) is a professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Süper Lig club Fenerbahçe, on loan from Serie A club Fiorentina, and the Morocco national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps
